Scripts.OnClick: if this:GetChecked() then GF_AddRemoveSearch( string.gsub(string.gsub(this:GetName(), "^GF_", ""), "%d+$", ""), getglobal(this:GetName() .. "TextLabel"):GetText(), true ) else GF_AddRemoveSearch( string.gsub(string.gsub(this:GetName(), "^GF_", ""), "%d+$", ""), getglobal(this:GetName() .. "TextLabel"):GetText(), nil ) end

if arg1 == "LeftButton" then if IsShiftKeyDown() then if not GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts then GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = true DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_ON) else GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = nil DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_OFF) end GF_ShowChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts); else GF_ToggleMainFrame(); end else if GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:GetChecked() then GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = nil; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_OFF) else GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = true; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_ON) end GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat); end
if not GF_SearchList:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("SearchList") else GF_SearchList:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "SearchList")) then GF_SearchList:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or (GetMouseFocus() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "SearchList")) then GF_SearchList:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.joinworld = this:GetChecked(); if GF_SavedVariables.joinworld then GF_JoinWorld(); else GF_LeaveWorld() end
